rules_text: When Her Majesty's Neophyte enters the battlefield, you may destroy target creature with power 2 or less. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on Her Majesty's Neophyte.
flavor_text:
[i]“Watch my every move, listen to my every word, follow my every footstep. If you do, then on the fateful day that I should die, you might be half the ruler I am now.”
— Petrova K'alinn[/i]
